channel.title: March on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in March on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Signs of spring
item.description: In no particular order, ignoring the snow day today and the half a foot of fresh snow on the ground. Thanks to Patti for the updates! Daylight saving time. It's now light what seems like late into the evening, and it's only going to get lighter later from now on through mid summer. Snowdrops. Spotted yesterday (before the snow) at the sunny side of our house. Festifools is only a few weeks away.
